ModMetaData.name: AnimalFoodRestrictionInTab
ModMetaData.author: Hatti
ModMetaData.description: Enabled FoodRestriction on the animal tab. This mod has a dependency to following mod, that enabled food restrictions for animals. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1547017052&searchtext=animal+food AnimalFoodRestrictionInTab mod must be after the dependant mod in the mod load order!
